title: Leading chemical drugs dispensed in England 2018 , by items
yAxis: Number of items dispensed in millions
summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Item, and Number of items dispensed in millions in each Item on the y axis.
The Number of items dispensed in millions is highest at Item Atorvastatin and lowest at Item Bendroflumethiazide.
The highest Item Atorvastatin has 31.8 more Number of items dispensed in millions than the lowest Item Bendroflumethiazide.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of items dispensed in millions for 20 number of Items.
The Number of items dispensed in millions is appeared to be the highest at Item Atorvastatin and lowest at Item Bendroflumethiazide.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Item, and Number of items dispensed in millions in each Item on the y axis.
The Number of items dispensed in millions is highest at Item Atorvastatin and lowest at Item Bendroflumethiazide.
The highest Item Atorvastatin has 31.8 more Number of items dispensed in millions than the lowest Item Bendroflumethiazide.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of items dispensed in millions for 20 number of Items.
The Number of items dispensed in millions is appeared to be the highest at Item Atorvastatin and lowest at Item Bendroflumethiazide.
Item Levothyroxine Sodium has the second highest value for Number of items dispensed in millions.
The minimum Item Bendroflumethiazide has got 4.18 times less Number of items dispensed in millions than the maximum Item Atorvastatin.
Number of items dispensed in millions at Item Atorvastatin is 41.8 , second place is Levothyroxine Sodium at 32.2, and thirdly is Omeprazole at 31.0.
Item Bisoprolol Fumarate, and Colecalciferol share the same value 23.6.
The lowest value 10.0 at Bendroflumethiazide is almost 1.92 times smaller than the average value 21.74.
The Number of items dispensed in millions is 434.8 if we add up values of all Items.
